articles.title: ABOUT
articles.contents:
Alessandro Ghiretti | Phd Statistics
Statistician, data enthusiast, traveller and motorbike rider.
My name is Alessandro Ghiretti and I work as a Data Scientist in the Pharma sector. After graduating in Marketing I obtained a Phd in Statistics where I got interested in robust statistics and outlier detection, time series analysis, econometrics, and machine learning.
R is my computing choice but in the past I have also spent time playing with Matlab and Python.
In my free time I like traveling, riding my motorbike (KTM 790 adventure S), listening music, reading and watching movies (Netflix addicted)
